title: Into The West Titing Font
content: What is the titling Font used in TNT’s “Into the West”? Who is the designer?
author: dhannah1000

comments.content:
_( It would be pretty helpful if you maybe could post a sample image / link, next time, Danny.. :)_

_The fonts used [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111215730/http:/alt.tnt.tv/itw/), seem to be_ ‘ [Miranda](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111215730/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/timrolands/miranda/)’, _by [Tim Rolands](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111215730/http:/www.timrolands.com/)_, _and_ ‘Arial’..

Miranda.  Very nice font and incredible ID (again and again).  
Dav,  couldn’t you just screw up _on occasion_ so as to appear mortal?
Thanks, Mike.. _( Oh, And, I do screw up, every now and then.. :) But normally I just dont post a reply, if I am unsure, or unaware, about the typeface.. I am sure willing to fail, more often.. :)_

_But normally I just don’t post a reply, if I am unsure, or unaware, about the typeface…_

Hey!? You stole my best trick!
